title: So riot was not ok with tank Ekko, but they are ok with tank Karma?

replies.body: but tank karma has no damage at all and some weak ass cc that is easily outclassed by most other support. defeats the purpose of poke support when your pokes will do nothing.
tank karma is literally outclassed by ANY AND ALL tank supports

How the hell are you comparing tank Karma to tank Ekko? Tank Ekko had insane synergy with Iceborn+ Sunfire+ his passive and his base damages, dealing sustained damage, he had mobility, safety. What does Karma have?
Tank Karma hasn't been relevant for like 8 months, kinda late to the whinning party.
Tank karma does not kill you. Tank ekko killed you.

You basically dominated the Tank Karma who was the support and went 3 kills with 13 deaths. http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2632686590/210462630?tab=overview

I don't see the problem.
